title.bibl: Svenska Kuriren, June 3, 1911. The Swedish Language in Chicago Schools

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

div.bibl: Svenska Kuriren, June 3, 1911. THE SWEDISH LANGUAGE IN CHICAGO SCHOOLS

body.p: Several representative Swedes presented a petition to the Board of the Schools in Chicago some time ago that the Swedish language ought to be introduced as a free subject in same of the schools. The superntendent of the schools, Ella Flag Young, has decided to postpone the experiment until there is some result shown from the experiment with the Polish language, which will be introduced in the school this Fall.
